name: MakingCosmetics - Palmitic Acid 735
description: MakingCosmetics offers Palmitic Acid 735 for multiple cosmetic applications including barrier repair formulations. Suitable for creams, cream rinses, shampoos, conditioners, and soaps. Palmitic acid is a key structural lipid in the skin barrier and essential for maintaining proper lipid matrix composition. For external use only.
notes: Excellent resource for small-scale formulators and R&D. Multiple cosmetic applications including creams, shampoos, conditioners, and soaps. Essential structural lipid for barrier repair formulations. Small quantity availability supports experimentation and product development.
specializations: Creams, cream rinses, shampoos, conditioners, soaps
notes: MakingCosmetics offers Palmitic Acid 735 for external use formulations including creams, cream rinses, shampoos, conditioners, and soaps. Target market includes small-scale formulators and DIY cosmetics. US-based supplier.
